hints.label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
hints.title: Revival Operator is KL-Expansive (VERIFIED)
hints.content:
963: :label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
964: 
965: The mean-field revival operator $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ **increases** the KL-divergence to the invariant measure $\pi$:
966: 
967: $$
968: \frac{d}{dt} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \pi) \Big|_{\text{revival}} > 0 \quad \text{for all } \rho \neq \pi, \, m_d > 0
969: $$
hints.raw_directive:
960: **Conclusion**: Since $D_{\text{KL}} \ge 0$, $\lambda > 0$, $m_d > 0$, and $\|\rho\|_{L^1} > 0$, the entropy production is **strictly positive**.
961: 
962: :::{prf:theorem} Revival Operator is KL-Expansive (VERIFIED)
963: :label: thm-revival-kl-expansive
964: 
965: The mean-field revival operator $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ **increases** the KL-divergence to the invariant measure $\pi$:
966: 
967: $$
968: \frac{d}{dt} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \pi) \Big|_{\text{revival}} > 0 \quad \text{for all } \rho \neq \pi, \, m_d > 0
969: $$
970:

hints.label: thm-joint-not-contractive
hints.title: Joint Jump Operator NOT Unconditionally Contractive (VERIFIED)
hints.raw_directive:
984: - **Negative** when $\|\rho\|_{L^1} > \frac{\lambda}{\lambda + \kappa}$ (contractive above equilibrium)
985: 
986: :::{prf:theorem} Joint Jump Operator NOT Unconditionally Contractive (VERIFIED)
987: :label: thm-joint-not-contractive
988:
